phrases: You Are Here
Koichi...
Over here, Koichi.
Ah!
R-Rohan Kishibe!
Come on, now.
You do not have to put up your guard like that.
It is not like I am going to harm you.
Besides, when I read you with Heaven's Door,
I actually felt a lot of admiration for you.
I have a feeling we have a lot in common.
Do not you think so?
Uh...
You see, there is something that I wanted to ask you.
I lived around here from when I was a baby up until I was about four.
I wanted to find the place where I lived then, for nostalgia's sake.
It is also a manga artist's job to remember their childhood.
But the memories would be from when I was three or four,
so I do not remember much.
Oh...
What I wanted to ask you about is this town map.
It is quite bizarre.
Look.
Convenience Store Owson
Kisara Drugstore
Soba Shop Arisugawa
Tailor Tanaka
You Are Here
Soba Shop Arisugawa, Kisara Drugstore,
and the convenience store Owson is how the shops line up from the right.
Huh?
Now look at the actual shops.
From the right, it is Soba Shop Arisugawa, Kisara Drugstore, and...
Owson on the left...
Huh?
The road between Owson and the drugstore is not on the map.
How lazy of them.
Koichi, will you come with me for a bit?
I would be very grateful if you would show me around here.
Huh?
Well, I, uh...
Even after I, Rohan Kishibe, have asked so courteously?
I see.
So you are not even willing to walk ten or so meters.
You are so selfish.
Jeez...
Just five minutes, okay, Sensei?
Just five minutes!
Episode 17 Rohan Kishibe's Adventure
Is not it bizarre?
This road is not on this 1/3000 scale map
of Morioh published by National Map Publishers.
Huh?
Sometimes if you find errors in maps,
they will give you a bookstore gift certificate.
Ugh...
Jeez, this map is infuriating.
Look, Koichi.
Yonemori
These houses that say Yonemori, Honma, and Onodera are not on it, either.
Honma
Numakura
Onodera
This map is filled with errors.
Two or three bookstore gift certificates will not cover this.
Rohan-sensei..
Looks like an empty house.
Rocky
What a strange place.
It does not look like anyone lives in these four or five houses.
Even the electricity to the vending machine's been cut.
Huh?
That post box...
This is where we first turned.
How strange...
How did we end up back where we started again?
But we turned right, left, then right, so how...
It is possible that we are being attacked by someone is Stand.
Huh?
Stand?!
Koichi, would you have Reverb fly up to the sky?
I see!
If it looks down from above, we will see which way to go.
Reverb Act 1!
What is the matter?
Th-There is something there.
Something touched it up in the sky.
I did not see anything.
But something definitely touched it!
Are you two lost?
Want me to show you the way?
A girl!
That girl's a Stand user!
Heaven's Door!
Do not even give her a chance to speak!
Victory to the swiftest!
Boom
Now we are safe.
She will not be able to harm us.
That is amazing!
I-It looked like a drawing leaped out just now...
I guess that means I have matured a bit.
Though it would not work on lame people like Josuke,
who do not like my manga.
We are on the same wavelength.
She is not a Stand user.
She is just a normal girl.
Huh?
Sh-She is not an enemy?
Right.
You cannot hide anything from Heaven's Door.
She is Reimi Sugimoto, age 16.
Her address is 3-12, Kotodai, Morioh.
It is right over there.
She does not have a boyfriend.
Her measurements are 82-57-84 centimeters.
She has a mole on the side of her left nipple.
She had her first period the September after she turned 11.
The first time she kissed a boy, he forced his tongue into her mouth.
Hey!
Hold on a sec, Rohan Kishibe!
If that girl's not a Stand user,
then I will not allow you to read any more about her!
All right, all right.
Do not get so angry.
She will forget everything that just happened.
There.
Want me to show you the way?
A lot of people get lost around here,
since all the alleys looks alike.
We will be fine if you could just tell us which way to go.
No, no.
You will not understand if I just explain it to you.
I will show you the way, so follow me.
Want one?
No?
Could you just grab the other end, then?
Snap
Aw, you are going to get dumped by some girl.
What are you talking about?
It is Pocky fortune-telling.
How the Pocky breaks tells me your fortune.
You are selfish, are not you?
And you have a tendency to mess with people.
That is why you will get dumped.
Did you hear that, Koichi?
She is completely off!
She called me selfish!
If we are going to play that game, I know a thing or two, as well.
Light pink nail polish means you are a coward when it comes to love.
You let true love slip away at the crucial moment.
Huh?
No way...
This is a psychological test, not fortune-telling.
Other than love, there is something else scaring you right now, is not there?
Apparently,
a murder took place at this house about fifteen years ago.
A murder?!
Murder...
No one lives there now.
Do you want to hear about it?
I heard this from the old lady who lives next door.
The night of the murder,
while the girl who lived here was asleep in her bedroom,
she awoke to a drip, drip sound coming from her parents' room.
She wondered what the sound was, and called out to her parents,
but there was no reply.
But the girl was not that scared, because...
Her beloved dog was by her side.
Beloved dog?
Yes.
He was a big guard dog.
Even in the dark, if she put her hand underneath her bed,
he would whimper and lick her hand.
She felt safe because Arnold was with her.
But she heard the dripping sound go on for more than ten minutes...
Finally, the girl decided to find out what the sound was.
And then...
She found her beloved dog Arnold dead,
hanging from the coat rack.
His blood was the dripping sound that she heard.
Suddenly, she heard a voice from under the bed say,
Your hand is so soft and cute, Miss.
Whimper, whimper...
I already killed your parents.
And then...
The girl was killed, too!
I-Is that a true story?!
Did it sound like one?
It was just payback for trashing my nail polish.
Whew...
Th-That stuff is bad for my heart...
Jeez...
Drip
Wha
That is...
Yes...
That girl was me.
Both Arnold and I are ghosts.
G-Ghosts?
What my Stand, Heaven's Door, read
were memories from when she was alive, so I could not tell.
You two walked into the place where I died fifteen years ago.
I guess we are on the same wavelength.
This is the border between the living world and the next.
Re
Rev
Rever
Reverb
Ko
Koichi
Koichi Hiro
Koichi Hirose
Let us get out of here, Koichi!
I-It is no use!
Use Reverb, Koichi!
Have it fly into the air and find the way!
She must have been what touched it in the sky earlier.
Just have it fly up already, Koichi!
Wha
What?!
There is suddenly a wall in the sky!
K-Koichi, Reverb is touching the ground.
Huh?!
Ah, what?!
Y-You are the one who went flying up into the air.
There is only one way out of this place.
And I know where it is.
H-How are we supposed to fight a ghost?
Please do not possess us!
Hey, hold on.
Stop treating me like a vengeful spirit.
What did I do to you?
You are the ones getting all scared on your own!
I am not the one who trapped you in here.
This is the border between this world and the next.
You two have strange powers.
They are called Stands?
I wonder if that is how you ended up here.
You are not our enemy?
You really do not trust people, do you?
I think I am what they call a bound spirit?
I became a ghost that cannot leave here.
For fifteen years, I tried to speak to various people who ended up here,
because I needed to tell someone.
But you are the first ones that I have been able to talk to this much.
I told you I would tell you how to get out of here, and that is what I am going to do.
After I finish the story, that is.
Story?
The rest of my story from earlier.
Before I could see the murderer's face,
I was stabbed in the back with a knife.
It was late at night and dark,
and I was desperately running away.
The murderer has not been caught yet.
He is somewhere in Morioh.
That is what I wanted to tell someone.
He is blended into this town.
Wait.
Are you telling us because...
I am not asking you to catch him.
But I want you to tell someone...
Someone who can catch him, like the police...
Whoa, whoa.
Why should we have to do something like that?
Rohan-sensei!
It is fine.
I just want to say the rational thing.
I do feel bad that you were killed...
But why should we have to find the murderer just because of
your personal grudge and suffering?
I think, as a ghost, you would be better off
cutting your ties to this world and passing on into the next.
Do you even know how many boys and girls have disappeared from this town?
Huh?
No.
It is eight times the national average.
I am not saying it is all of them, but at least some of them are being killed in secret.
By him.
W-Wait a second!
Are you saying these murders are still happening?
Hey!
Do not make baseless claims like that!
You just said you did not see the murderer's face!
So how would you know that?
The souls of the murdered fly above here all the time!
And they all have a wound just like this.
H-How cruel...
It is so long and deep...
I cannot talk to those souls going to the next world,
but I have seen them many times.
I know what he is into!
I know!
These murders have been going on for
fifteen years here in Morioh, where I was born and raised.
It is frightening, and it wounds my pride.
When they catch the murderer, my beloved Morioh
will be known nationwide as a town where a murderer lived.
But we have to stop the murderer as soon as possible!
Even now, he is targeting someone, and I cannot do a thing.
Who is going to be killed next?
If you, the living, do not take back this town's pride and peace,
who else is going to do it?!
I do not know if you understand what I am saying, but...
I am done talking now.
A-All right.
I am very shocked.
But...
Still, we have to do something.
Hmph.
Stop being such a goody-two-shoes, Koichi.
It is just going to be trouble.
But it might be good to go after the murderer and interview him.
I might be able to draw a really interesting manga!
Is the exit this way?
If you think he is a good person deep down... well, you should not.
He is pretty gray when it comes to being trustworthy.
Hey, are you listening?
All right.
I will lead you to the exit.
Huh?
The exit?
Where?
Where is it?
If you turn left past the post box, it is right there.
Yay!
Do not rush!
There is a certain rule you have to follow to get past there.
A rule?
Once you pass the post box and turn,
you will be able to see the exit about 20 meters away.
No matter what happens,
until you get there, promise me that you will not turn around.
What?
Why?
It is the rule for passing from this world to the next.
Even Arnold understands that.
Well, I guess we can promise to do something even a dog can handle.
What happens if we turn around?
Our souls will be pulled into the next world, which means you will die.
Do not be frightened!
Just do not turn around.
Simple, right?
R-Right when we passed the post box...
Something shot between our legs and went behind us!
Do not turn around!
Just keep walking slowly and calmly.
R-Rohan-sensei, something is following us.
I know.
Something is there...
Something is right behind my head!
Do not worry about it!
There is always something trying to make you turn around.
But as long as you do not turn and look at it,
it cannot touch you, so just keep your wits about you.
N-Now a warm liquid is dripping down my neck...
You are almost there!
That light is the exit.
What?
Huh?
Th-The exit...
But I cannot take it any longer!
Rohan-sensei, let us run!
Do not panic!
It is going to try to trip you.
You are safe now.
You got through it.
You can turn around from there.
That was so scary!
I am so relieved!
That was a lie, Koichi!
That was not really me just now!
Huh?
Impossible...
Not yet.
Do not look back yet.
This did not happen when I was by myself.
They did not try to trick me!
Koichi!
Hmph.
I do not really get it, but we just cannot look, right?
You are lucky you are with me, Koichi.
Heaven's Door!
You will not be able to see, and you will be blown away.
Crash
Boom
Calm down, Koichi.
I will write that you can see again now.
The road between the convenience store and drugstore is gone.
W-We made it back...
We will always be here.
Until the murderer's caught.
The day that Arnold and I turn around to go
where my mom and dad are will be
when the pride and peace of this town are restored.
Until then, I cannot leave here.
If you ever need to ask me anything,
come by any time.
We can see each other any time,
Rohannie and Koichi...
I thank you from the bottom of my heart
for listening to what I had to say.
That girl had some nerve, calling me Rohannie.
She was getting too friendly.
But... Reimi Sugimoto, huh...
There is something admirable about how that ghost lives.
She is been fighting for fifteen years, alone, for the sake of the living.
Zero Clues Found in Family Massacre
Sugimoto Family Grave
Sugimoto Reimi
There it is!
Sugimoto Reimi, age 16.
Not that I doubted her, but now I have got some clues.
Ah, could you be...
Rohan Kishibe, who became a manga artist?
You know me?
Rohan, you were only four,
so it is no surprise that you do not remember that incident.
Your house at the time was very near theirs.
The night of that incident, your parents had urgent business
they had to attend to and were forced to leave...
So they left you overnight at the Sugimoto household
because you were all very close.
That night, Rohan, you were staying overnight at the Sugimoto household.
And you were the only one to survive.
I was... there?
Sugimoto Family Grave
When the police found you,
you kept crying and repeating the same thing over and over.
Reimi snuck me out the window.
Reimi saved you before you could be found by the murderer.
That little girl...
No wonder she acted all friendly with me.
I cannot read my distant memories nor my fate with my Stand, Heaven's Door.
If you happen to wander down this path,
do not turn around, no matter what.
Morioh Landmark 6 The Path Where You Can Meet a Girl's Ghost How to get there:
Take the 11 bus from Morioh Station and get off at the Kotodai Shopping District.
It will appear between the convenience store, Owson, and Kisara Drugstore at 2-chome.
Warning: Most people will not be able to see it, but if you happen to wander down this path, do not turn around, no matter what.
I really met a ghost!
The girl in that picture is Reimi!
Okay, we get it.
So, I researched her,
I said I believe you, did not I?
Right, Okuyasu?
and she was also a student at Budogaoka High School.
She is cute...
She is my type.
I wish I would been born fifteen years sooner.
We should eventually go meet this ghost, too.
But, Koichi, if we tell Jotaro or Old Man Joseph about this,
they are probably going to ask one thing.
Is the murderer a Stand user?
W-Well... I do not know...
Then we will just have to let the police and the courts deal with it.
B-But there is a murderer in Morioh!
I know.
And that is why I am saying that Jotaro and the Speedwagon Foundation
will not just go after a normal murderer.
Calm down.
He is managed to escape from the almighty police for the past fifteen years.
It is not like we would run into him right away, like we would hailed a taxi cab.
Let us stay calm and look into this carefully.
So what did Rohan have to say?
The same thing as you, Josuke.
Hey, look out, Koichi.
Do not cross the road when you are all spaced out.
S-Sorry...
Originally, Morioh was a resort filled with villas that belonged to samurai.
My ancestors were among them.
But we were ruined during my grandfather's time.
All that is left is the house that I live in now.
And I am stuck working a trivial office job.
Hey, what did you do with the imported wristwatch I bought you?
Ah, it is in your bag.
That is right.
It was a little too big for you.
Let us get it fixed tomorrow.
What is wrong?
Why are you acting so shy?
Now...
Watch your step.
Let us enjoy this weekend to the fullest.
Just the two of us.
You just dripped something...
How rude you are.
You need to clean that up yourself.
I cannot remember what your name was, but that is all right.
Well done.
You cleaned it all off.
Now, then...
Let us make dinner together.
What is the dish that you are best at?
Kira
Kira
Episode 18 Shigechi's Harvest, Part 1
Episode 18 Shige chi's Ha rvest, Part 1
